GET /client/payments/v1/apps/primary_pro.skipReason: Requires an installed + fully connected payments app for the business (configured payments_gateway_type + external_<provider>_connected flag + additional connection checks). This prerequisite cannot be satisfied in the test environment via available APIs, so the endpoint will always 422 for most fresh businesses.

GET /client/payments/v1/packages/{packag.expectedOutcomeReason: 200 when package exists and client token is valid.

POST /client/payments/v1/cards.skipReason: Requires external prerequisite: connect a credit card processor / enable vaulting for the business (business.vaulting_enabled? must be true). Not possible to satisfy via API-only test in this environment.

POST /client/payments/v1/cards/save_card.skipReason: Test environment prerequisites not satisfiable: business does not have required feature flag (cp_add_new_cof) enabled, and client token cannot be acquired to execute endpoint as documented (client_jwt flow fails with 400).

POST /platform/v1/clients/payment/client.skipReason: Blocked by server-side 500 error and missing prerequisite test data (no client payment_requests available to obtain a valid pending payment_status_id).

GET /business/payments/v1/scheduled_paym.expectedOutcomeReason: No scheduled payment rules exist in the test environment and recurring payments are not supported by the primary gateway. Without an active rule, get-by-uid returns a validation error.

GET /platform/v1/payment_statuses/{id}/v.expectedOutcomeReason: No valid coupon exists in the test environment. The endpoint returns 422 'Invalid Coupon' for non-existent coupon codes.

POST /business/payments/v1/card_requests.expectedOutcomeReason: Card requests require a configured payment gateway in this environment. The test business has no configured gateway, so the API returns 422.

POST /platform/v1/invoices.expectedOutcomeReason: APIGW returns 422 Unauthorized for Staff/Directory tokens; use fallback API to reach core where Staff token works.

PUT /business/payments/v1/scheduled_paym.expectedOutcomeReason: No active scheduled payment rules exist in the test environment. The API validates that only 'active' scheduled payment rules can be updated.
No scheduled payment rules exist in the test environment and recurring payments are not supported by the primary gateway. Without an active rule, cancel returns a validation error.

PUT /platform/v1/payment/checkout/.skipReason: Manual skip - endpoint not ready for testing

PUT /platform/v1/payment/client_packages.expectedOutcomeReason: The created client package has no booking redemptions. Cancel redemption requires an existing redemption, which cannot be created in this environment.

PUT /v3/payment_processing/payment_gatew.expectedOutcomeReason: PUT requires the app token that owns the specific gateway. Using a different app's gateway returns 400 'Cannot access payment gateway for different app'.
